intro: Connarus lucidus, commonly known as the glossy connarus, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage with glossy, dark green leaves. It produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Connarus lucidus is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
